hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "A prophet among the prophets went for a military expedition and said to his people: "A man who has married a lady and wants to consummate his marriage with her and he has not done so yet, should not accompany me

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَحَبَّ الْبِنَاءَ قَبْلَ الْغَزْوِ
chapter.eng-name: To consummate the marriage before going on a military campaign
